name: FxCommandAPI
desc: Commands that you can tell the host to perform.

items.name: func perform(FxCommand)
items.desc: Instructs the host application to perform a command.

items.name: protocol FxCommandHandler
items.desc: Defines the methods a plug-in must implement to be notified of the applicationâ€™s key binding for common commands.

items.name: enum FxCommand
items.desc: Defines the commands that can be performed by the host.

items.name: let kKey_Command: String
items.desc: The FxCommand that will be invoked by this keypress.

items.name: let kKey_Character: String
items.desc: The character the user must press to invoke the command.

items.name: let kKey_Modifiers: String
items.desc: The modifiers the user must include in the keypress to invoke the command.
